trans-unit.source: No modules have been registered. Please contact your system administrator.
This is a short system overview. For advanced information please head to the Install Tool.
Your system is fully operational. Have a nice day.
Logo: If set, this logo will be used instead of the TYPO3 logo above the login credential fields.
Highlight Color: If set, this color will be used as highlight color in the login screen.
Background Image: If set, this image will be used as background image for the login screen for screen sizes greater than 767 pixel. This should be a URI such as /fileadmin/my-background.jpg
